text: (Twaranavuze tuti) "Nimugira neza ni mwe muzabamwigiriye neza, kandi nimunagira nabi ni mwe muzaba mwihemukiye. Nuko ubwo isezeranorya nyuma rizasohora, (tuzashoboza abanzi banyu) kugira ngo babasuzuguze, baninjiremu musigiti (w’i Yeruzalemu) nk’uko bawinjiyemo bwa mbere, ndetse bazanasenya ibyo bazajya bahura nabyo byose
